title: Senior Team Lead (PHP and/or Java)
content:
If you shop online (and who doesn’t these days?), then chances are you’ve already interacted with Yotpo. We’re a leading eCommerce retention marketing platform, on a mission to help brands of all sizes turn one-time shoppers into customers for life. Loyalty programs, SMS and email marketing, subscriptions, and reviews are our bread and butter, but we have more solutions up our sleeve, too.
We have teams across the world, including the US, Canada, UK, Israel, Bulgaria, and Australia — and we’re still growing. Our primary goal is to deliver the best technology in the industry.
You can hear all about it in our latest brand video. 
Sounds exciting? Then read on, because we’re in pursuit of the best and the brightest minds to help us achieve our vision.We are looking for a motivated Senior Team Leader  who is excited about growing, both personally and with the development team, as well as solving complex technical and business problems. The person is going to be working on adding features to the existing integrations (Shopify and Magento) and expanding our SaaS on new eCommerce platforms.
Core responsibilities and day-to-day activities of the position:

Leading the team in an agile environment, communicating with the Product Manager, balancing workloads, and positioning the team for scalability
Setting of KPIs to ensure the proper delivery of the business goals
Allocating time for a hands-on personal example of a great development
Be part of the development of new features and maintain existing ones for our app on Shopify and Magento
Be part of the team that develops Yotpo SMS & Email on brand new eCommerce platforms
Be part of the team that builds and expands our API
Works with different stakeholders in our team members (DevOps, FE & BE Devs, R&D Manager, CEO)

Main Requirements:

Fluent use and understanding of PHP and/or Java, and their use in scalable applications
Extensive understanding of MVC, OOP, and essential Design Patterns
Familiarity of MySQL, NoSQL
Understanding how to use Docker Containers
Significant and proven experience with with PHP frameworks like Symfony, Laravel, CakePHP, Spring Boot
CI/CD experience, Bitbucket, Jenkins, GitHub Actions
End to end testing experience

 
It's nice to have (but not mandatory)

Monitoring and Logging: Kibana, Elasticsearch, Cloudwatch, Grafana
NodeJS or/and Java understanding
Experience with API’s and API specifications (OpenAPI, Swagger)
Knowledge of AWS is a plus, ECS, S3, Lambda, SQS, SNS, API Gateway

 
The perfect Candidate:

Has proven leadership experience in engineering teams
Loves what he/she is doing and building new things
Low on Ego and High on Team Spirit
Has strong collaboration skills
Stays focused and achieves goals
Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English

 
What we offer:

Track to success – work in a dynamic organization with ambient and laid-back office atmosphere + best coffee in town
Individualized career development, rewards and recognition.
Work-life balance – 25 days paid vacation with add-ons for loyalty, regular team buildings and celebrations in and outside the country
Additional health insurance package
Internal mobility program and refer-a-friend program
Managing a fixed monthly budget for social benefits thru Re:Benefit – a flexible online benefits solution
Food vouchers – monthly
E-learning portals and knowledge sharing sessions.
Company backed Hackathons, Tech conferences, workshops events, etc
Stocked kitchen and bar.
Equity in options.
We are now working in a flexible hybrid capacity.

 #LI-Hybrid
